Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Valkyrie
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
Soaring through the tumultuous skies of GrimWorld 40,000, the Valkyrie Assault Carrier is a symbol of airborne supremacy. With its sleek and purposeful design, this airborne behemoth embodies the airborne prowess of the Imperium in the grim 41st millennium.

Adorned with aerodynamic plating that bears witness to countless sorties, the Valkyrie stands as a testament to its unyielding service in the ongoing war. Its streamlined and formidable aesthetic reflects the demanding nature of aerial warfare within the Imperium.

Tailored for rapid assault and airborne operations, the Valkyrie is a symbol of aerial dominance. Its robust frame allows for swift troop deployment and close air support, making it a crucial asset in the Imperium's strategy against the myriad threats in GrimWorld 40,000.

As it navigates the turbulent skies, the Valkyrie Assault Carrier represents the Imperium's command of the aerial domain, offering unparalleled mobility and firepower in the relentless struggle against the encroaching darkness. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
